data.description:
Modern Education of new generation!

Discover subjects that you wouldn't experience in regular classroom.
VR Edu Lab allows you to observe, interact and understand complex topics, for example cell structure, motor mechanics or chemical reactions.

130+ models
We regularly add new 3D models that take VR learning to a new level.

Learning with VR Edu Lab is easy a intuitive
Students collaborate, communicate and move around in a shared virtual space. The teacher simply controls and monitors the learning environment, locks and unlocks permisions for team and individual work. The teacher primarily controls VR through the computer. Therefore, it is not necessary for the teacher to use VR glasses.

Edu Lab enables:
•	Display of 3D models
•	Manipulation of 3D models
•	Disassembling and assembling models
•	Move through animations
•	Creation and automatic evaluation of tests.

Example of 3D models
•	Volume of the cube and the block
•	Pyramid, cone ball
•	Photosynthesis
•	Bacteria, cyanobacteria, algae
•	Snail, clam, earthworm
•	Movement of lithospheric plates
•	Atoms, molecules
•	Nuclear power plant operation
•	Fission of uranium nuclei
•	Refraction and reflection of light
•	Position energy
•	Earth's magnetic field
•	Solar and lunar eclipses

changelog.change_log:
New features:
•	Portuguese - Added a new localization
•	New look for buttons – Buttons are now divided into several functions (reset model, special actions, reveal model interior, start animation, pause/play)

Bug fixes:
•	Scales of the World - Enlarging captions for readability
•	German localization fix
